a.comment: slope coefficient of linear equation f(x)

b.comment: denominator of the exponent of nonlinear function g(x)

c.comment: threshold value defining the cutoff for when f(x) ends and g(x) starts

l.comment: lower limit of linear function (i.e. minimum required stake)

budget.comment: budget for the given distribution period

s.comment: split ratio between automated and airdrop mode
